Introduction

The Wallet-Mining extension is an innovative solution that leverages decentralized wallet address routing technology. It offers users a robust set of features, including wallet import, CNTP token transfers, and continuous CNTP mining, regardless of whether the extension is open or closed.

CNTP Wallet Extension Features

1) Wallet Import:

The CNTP Wallet allows users to quickly and securely import their wallets, seamlessly integrating them into the extensionâ€™s ecosystem. This enables centralized management of digital assets, providing users with both convenience and complete control.

2) CNTP Token Transfers:

With the Wallet-Mining extension, users can easily send CNTP tokens to other wallets. This feature ensures fast and secure transactions, simplifying the management and distribution of assets within the CNTP network.

3) Continuous CNTP Mining:

The extension offers continuous CNTP mining, even when the extension is closed. This ensures that users can maximize their mining potential without needing to keep the extension actively open, providing a consistent stream of rewards.
